docs.title: Welcome to my portfolio, in which you'll find my resume as well as some of my recent projects related to Software Engineering.
docs.text: I'm a software engineer currently working as R&D engineer in the automotive industry in Japan. Interested in automotive software (ADAS and Autonomous driving), robotics, and computer vision. Passionate about sharing and empowering students during my university days, I volunteered for student chapters to organize tech related events.

docs.title: Skills
docs.text:
• Software development: C++ (from 11 to 23 std) • Python (Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, standard library, ) • Machine Learning (CNNS, Tensorflow & PyTorch, Sickit-learn) • Git • SQL • Linux CLI & Bash scripting • HTML and CSS
  • Automotive development: ADAS • Autonomous Emergency Brake • Matlab • Simulink • CAN • Ethernet • Brake Systems
  • Spanish (native), English native (TOEFL 560 | TOEIC 960), Japanese (business proficiency), French (B1).

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
